labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64, Fall Creator's Update (Version 1709), build 16299.19
data.actual_result: The video starts playback somewhere hidden inside the client, you can't see the video just hear the sound
data.expected_result: The video will open on youtube in the user's default browser
data.short_description: Middle mouse clicking a youtube link starts video playback hidden in the background of the client
data.steps_to_repro: - Place a youtube link into any text channel - Middle mouse click on the link
